name: ent-kaur-16-en-19-oate,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: ent-7alpha-Hydroxykaur-16-en-19-oic acid + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 6beta,7beta-Dihydroxykaurenoic acid + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
